languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт терпеливо ждет ответа. Чуть напряженная поза выдает ее волнение, но это неудивительно — эльдарка решилась провести сокровенный ритуал своего народа, дабы помочь человеку.{/n}
{n}Yrliet awaits your answer patiently. Her pose, a tad stiff, betrays her anxiety, but that is to be expected — she has decided to conduct a sacred Aeldari rite in order to help a human.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт терпеливо ждет ответа. Чуть напряженная поза выдает ее волнение, но это неудивительно — эльдарка решилась провести сокровенный ритуал своего народа, дабы помочь человеку.{/n}

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特静静地等待着你的回答。她略带僵硬的姿势流露出她心底的焦虑，但这完全可以理解，毕竟她打算举行艾达灵族的神圣仪式来帮助人类。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet awaits your answer patiently. Her pose, a tad stiff, betrays her anxiety, but that is to be expected — she has decided to conduct a sacred Aeldari rite in order to help a human.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特静静地等待着你的回答。她略带僵硬的姿势流露出她心底的焦虑，但这完全可以理解，毕竟她打算举行艾达灵族的神圣仪式来帮助人类。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet aguarda pacientemente tu respuesta. Su postura, un tanto tensa, delata su ansiedad, pero es normal; ha decidido llevar a cabo un ritual sagrado Aeldari para ayudar a {mf|un humano|una humana}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet awaits your answer patiently. Her pose, a tad stiff, betrays her anxiety, but that is to be expected — she has decided to conduct a sacred Aeldari rite in order to help a human.{/n}

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet attend patiemment votre réponse. Sa posture légèrement crispée trahit son inquiétude, mais cela n'a rien d'étonnant : elle vient de proposer à {mf|un humain|une humaine} d'accomplir un rite aeldari sacré.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet awaits your answer patiently. Her pose, a tad stiff, betrays her anxiety, but that is to be expected — she has decided to conduct a sacred Aeldari rite in order to help a human.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet attend patiemment votre réponse. Sa posture légèrement crispée trahit son inquiétude, mais cela n'a rien d'étonnant : elle vient de proposer à {mf|un humain|une humaine} d'accomplir un rite aeldari sacré.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet wartet geduldig auf deine Antwort. Ihre Haltung ist ein wenig steif und verrät ihre Nervosität, aber das ist kein Wunder – sie hat beschlossen, ein heiliges Aeldari-Ritual durchzuführen, um einem Menschen zu helfen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet awaits your answer patiently. Her pose, a tad stiff, betrays her anxiety, but that is to be expected — she has decided to conduct a sacred Aeldari rite in order to help a human.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet wartet geduldig auf deine Antwort. Ihre Haltung ist ein wenig steif und verrät ihre Nervosität, aber das ist kein Wunder – sie hat beschlossen, ein heiliges Aeldari-Ritual durchzuführen, um einem Menschen zu helfen.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは辛抱強くあなたの答えを待っている。わずかに体をこわばらせているその姿が彼女の不安を裏付けているものの、それは予想されたことだ。彼女は人間を助けるため、アエルダリの神聖な儀式を執り行うことにしたのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet awaits your answer patiently. Her pose, a tad stiff, betrays her anxiety, but that is to be expected — she has decided to conduct a sacred Aeldari rite in order to help a human.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは辛抱強くあなたの答えを待っている。わずかに体をこわばらせているその姿が彼女の不安を裏付けているものの、それは予想されたことだ。彼女は人間を助けるため、アエルダリの神聖な儀式を執り行うことにしたのだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet sabırla cevabını bekliyor. Sert duruşu, gerginliğine teslim oluyor ki buna şaşırmıyorsun. Sonuçta bir insana yardım etmek için kutsal bir Aeldari ayini gerçekleştirmeye karar verdi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet awaits your answer patiently. Her pose, a tad stiff, betrays her anxiety, but that is to be expected — she has decided to conduct a sacred Aeldari rite in order to help a human.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet sabırla cevabını bekliyor. Sert duruşu, gerginliğine teslim oluyor ama bu beklenmeyecek bir tepki değil. Sonuçta bir insana yardım etmek için kutsal bir Aeldari ayini gerçekleştirmeye karar verdi.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
